About Me

BIO

Agesa Austin is a web developer, with experience in developing individual's or organizations websites. I am fueled by my passion for understanding the nuances of web development. I consider myself a ‘forever student,’ eager to both build on my academic foundations in Computer Science and stay in tune with the latest digital marketing strategies through continued coursework.
